title: "Amazon.com retail margins could expand double digits: analysts"
text: "UBS analysts think it's likely Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) can expand its North American retail margins to double digits over time
source_name: calling the e-commerce giant their top idea in Internet while reiterating a ‘Buy' rating on the stock with a 12-month price target of $175 per share.  In an update to clients
date: they noted that margins will get a boost as the company unveils efficiency drives like regionalizing its fulfillment network
topics: pulls levers to recoup cost inflation
sentiment: reduces investment levels in moonshots such as Alexa
type: and generally focuses on efficiency while keeping headcount growth moderate and grows into capacity."
